description.plain:
Surf Curse is a group consisting of Nick Rattigan and Jacob Rubeck. Surf Curse was formed in Reno, Nevada in 2012, however before they decided on the name of Surf Curse they were called Buffalo 66.

Rubeck and Rattigan first met in eighth grade through a mutual friend, and formed a band during high school (Which Jacob was kicked out of).

Rattigan began drum lessons at age 8. He taught himself guitar because he realized that as a drummer you cannot write and perform songs. Currently Nick has two side projects besides Surf Curse: Televisions which is now called Current Joys, as well as “Devil Worship.”

Jacob Rubeck has two side projects as well: Casino Hearts & Franco Years. He highly dislikes the music scene in Nevada.

Their song ‘The Smell Saved My Life’ on their debut album ‘Buds’ refers to a music venue called The Smell (in Los Angeles) which gave them the attention they were searching for. In 2016 The Smell received a notice from their landlord that they are planning to tear down the venue to put in a parking lot. In 2017, Big Joy records released an album including most of their artists plus a few more called “Save The Smell,” in an effort to raise money to keep The Smell going.

Although they have moved far apart from each other (Nick in Brooklyn, NYC, NY & Jacob in Las Vegas, Nevada), they still get together to play shows during weekends.

body.plain:
Surf Curse is a group consisting of Nick Rattigan and Jacob Rubeck. Surf Curse was formed in Reno, Nevada in 2012, however before they decided on the name of Surf Curse they were called Buffalo 66.

Rubeck and Rattigan first met in eighth grade through a mutual friend, and formed a band during high school (Which Jacob was kicked out of).

Rattigan began drum lessons at age 8. He taught himself guitar because he realized that as a drummer you cannot write and perform songs. Currently Nick has two side projects besides Surf Curse: Televisions which is now called Current Joys, as well as “Devil Worship.”

Jacob Rubeck has two side projects as well: Casino Hearts & Franco Years. He highly dislikes the music scene in Nevada.

Their song ‘The Smell Saved My Life’ on their debut album ‘Buds’ refers to a music venue called The Smell (in Los Angeles) which gave them the attention they were searching for. In 2016 The Smell received a notice from their landlord that they are planning to tear down the venue to put in a parking lot. In 2017, Big Joy records released an album including most of their artists plus a few more called “Save The Smell,” in an effort to raise money to keep The Smell going.

Although they have moved far apart from each other (Nick in Brooklyn, NYC, NY & Jacob in Las Vegas, Nevada), they still get together to play shows during weekends.

songs.title: Freaks

description.plain:
Freaks is the eighth track from Surf Curse’s 2013 album, Buds.

The song alludes that the artist’s dreams are a safe haven for where he can be with the person he deeply cares for who doesn’t view him as a “freak” or social outcast. He wants to stay in his dream and not wake up to escape from everyone but that one person.

songs.embed_content: Read “Freaks” by Surf Curse on Genius

songs.lyrics:
72 ContributorsTranslationsРусскийFrançaisFreaks Lyrics[Verse 1]
Don't kill me, just help me run away
From everyone, I need a place to stay
Where I can cover up my face
Don't cry

[Chorus]
I am just a freak
I am just a freak
I am just a freak
I am just a freak

[Verse 2]
My head is filled with parasites
Black holes cover up my eyes
I dream of you almost every night
Hopefully

[Outro]
I won't wake up this time
I won't wake up this time
I won't wake up this time
I won't wake up this timeYou might also like51Embed

album.full_title: Heaven Surrounds You by Surf Curse
album.name: Heaven Surrounds You

songs.lyrics:
15 ContributorsDisco Lyrics[Verse 1]
I can't help it with you
Stubborn-hearted blue
Lights come into the room
When disco plays our tune

[Chorus]
'Cause there's nothing like it, not like the way you move
I can try but I can't hide it from you
'Cause I can't wait for you
I can't wait for you

[Verse 2]
Admire all of you
But fire burns me too
Can't stop that disco getting through
Can't stop that disco wanting you

[Chorus]
'Cause there's nothing like it, locking my eyes with you
I can't fight it, splitting my mind in two
'Cause I can't wait for you
I can't wait for you
I can't wait for you
I can't wait for youYou might also like15Embed

songs.title: Heathers

description.plain: This song is based on the 1989 movie “Heathers” in which a teenage Veronica is a part of an elite high school clique of 3 other controlling and manipulative girls, all of whom named Heather. After falling for a young, mysterious Jason Dean, Heather is tempted to enact revenge on the people she hates. Jason, with his revolver, tricks her into killing Heather as well as others and covering up the killings as suicides. This song is sung from Veronica’s perspective.

songs.lyrics:
17 ContributorsTranslationsEspañolHeathers Lyrics[Verse 1]
You should call me tonight when you are sleeping
So I can talk to all of your dreams

[Chorus]
And they'll tell me what to do
When I'm alone with you
'Cause I really do not understand
What the fuck is wrong with you

[Verse 2]
I've been crazy for this boy, I really like his gun
I think he's kind of crazy, but I've got nowhere to run

[Chorus]
And he tells me what to do
And he wants me to kill you
And I really think I might
Because, Heather, I hate youYou might also like8Embed
